thread.title: CBS News Names Margaret Brennan ‘Face the Nation’ Anchor

author: Austen Hufford
title: CBS News Names Margaret Brennan ‘Face the Nation’ Anchor
text:
CBS News named Margaret Brennan as the new moderator for the Washington-based Sunday show ‘Face the Nation,’ putting a journalist with expertise in politics, international affairs and business in one of its most prominent anchor slots.
Ms. Brennan, who joined CBS News in 2012, will continue as senior foreign affairs correspondent as she takes on the new role. She has also covered the White House for CBS.
CBS...
